App will be locked when there was no activity for few minutes. Set to zero for immediate locking.
From version 5, the app uses newer, stronger encryption algorithm.
Data encrypted with the older version of the app can be decrypted with Decrypt Legacy button.
Note that you need to use the same key used for encryption (same key can be used for new algorithm too, so you don\'t need to change your key.)
